title.narrative: Capacity building religious leaders and volunteers, Kargawe Diocese (KAD/ELCT)

description.narrative:
The goal of the project is capacity building of religious education in several Tanzanian communities. The religious education will foster growth in local communities as it is targeted the establishment of small businesses, micro-loan opportunities, small child care institutions and knowledge of how to manage conflicts through dialogue.
Capacity building for establishing small businesses and micro-loan companies.
Education in book keeping, childcare needs and rights, and rights of marginalized groups
Capacity building of religious institutions.
Dialogue training for conflict management.

The grant is given to the organisation due to their application to the COVID-19 Emergency Pool (Nødpulje) in order for the organisation to continue their skills development activities in India. Due to COVID-19 restrictions, planned development activities are in risk of closure, which would negatively affect results.
